revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Rock Tunnel |image = [[File:Rock Tunnel.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Rock Tunnel. |tokens = 500 |location = North of Lavender Town, or east of Cerulean City. }} '''Rock Tunnel''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 4,117 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:PokéManiac.png|40px]] PokéManiac Ashton || [[File:Cubone.png|40px]] Cubone, [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:PokéManiac.png|40px]] PokéManiac Winston || [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Picnicker.png|40px]] Picnicker Martha || [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish, [[File:Bulbasaur.png|40px]] Bulbasaur |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Mankey.png|40px]] Mankey || [[File:PokéManiac.png|40px]] PokéManiac Steve || [[File:Charmander.png|40px]] Charmander, [[File:Cubone.png|40px]] Cubone |- | [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Allen || [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Eric || [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop, [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | rowspan=4|[[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Lenny || [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude,
